alert.note: Alert for Chester; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Thunderstorms producing very gusty winds will impact portions of Chester and eastern Union Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with very gusty winds along a line extending from 7 miles east of Union to 19 miles southwest of Chester to 12 miles northwest of Newberry. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chester, Great Falls, Fort Lawn, Lockhart, Carlisle, Richburg, Chester State Park, Blackstock, Fishing Creek Reservoir and Leeds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
